title: ZK I Zettel 7,16a7 - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,16a7
					believed to be valid by the in-group in spite of theirinconsistencies [Robert S. Lynd, Middletown in Transition,New York 1937, Chap. XII and Knowledge of What?,Princeton 1939, p. 38-63] briefly of the 'relative natural aspect of theworld' (Max Scheler, Die Wissensformen und die Gesellschaft, Lpz1926, p. 58ff.)."
